title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list in the File menu is not persisted between sessions.
OB: The files that were opened in previous sessions do not appear in the MRU list of the File menu.
EB: The files that were opened in previous sessions should appear in the MRU list of the File menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Start the workbench.
2. Open 2 or 3 files.
3. Shutdown the workbench.
4. Restart the workbench and observe the File menu MRU list.
